cast.overview: A celebrity model couple are invited on a luxury cruise for the uber-rich, helmed by an unhinged, alcoholic captain. What first appears Instagrammable ends catastrophically, leaving the survivors stranded on a desert island in a struggle of hierarchy.
cast.title: Triangle of Sadness

details.biography:
Dolly Earnshaw de Leon (born 12 April 1969) is a Filipina film, television, and theater actress. She is best known for her roles in the films Verdict (2019), Historya ni Ha (2021), the Palme d'Or winning Triangle of Sadness (2022), Iti Mapukpukaw (2023), and A Very Good Girl (2023).

She received nominations for a Golden Globe Award and for a BAFTA Award for Best Supporting Actress (Triangle of Sadness), becoming the first Filipino to be nominated for the awards in any category.
details.name: Dolly de Leon
